data.eml:eml: A revision of the genus Drasteria of Central Asia and Kazakhstan with special attention to the adjacent areas (Lepidoptera: Erebidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yu, Alexey, Korb, Stanislav K. (2019): A revision of the genus Drasteria of Central Asia and Kazakhstan with special attention to the adjacent areas (Lepidoptera: Erebidae). Zootaxa 4673 (1): 1-104, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4673.1.1
